tools.name: casadi_kin_dyn

tools.name: AMICI

tools.detailed_description: A framework implementing Four-Dimensional Ensemble Variational (4D-EnVar) data assimilation specifically for land surface models in earth sciences.

tools.name: pygpc
tools.one_line_profile: Generalized Polynomial Chaos for sensitivity analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for sensitivity and uncertainty analysis based on the generalized polynomial chaos (gPC) method, suitable for quantifying uncertainty in complex models.

tools.name: DARTS
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Architecture Search
tools.detailed_description: A tool for differentiable architecture search (DARTS) that automates the design of convolutional and recurrent networks using gradient-based optimization.

tools.name: ttrecipes
tools.one_line_profile: Tensor train methods for sensitivity analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library for metamodeling, sensitivity analysis, and visualization using the tensor train format, enabling efficient handling of high-dimensional data.

tools.name: TOBS

tools.detailed_description: MATLAB code implementing the Topology Optimization of Binary Structures (TOBS) method, focusing on discrete structural optimization problems.

tools.name: paragami

tools.detailed_description: A library for 'folding' and 'unfolding' collections of parameters, facilitating optimization and sensitivity analysis by managing parameter shapes and constraints.

tools.name: AMRTO

tools.name: pbrnerf
